about_the_game:
🚖 Mountain Taxi Challenge – Take on the Wildest Taxi Rides!

Welcome to Mountain Taxi Challenge, where you’re not just a driver—you’re a lifesaver, a problem solver, and a master of the mountain roads! Take on 30 thrilling missions as you navigate treacherous mountain paths, rescue stranded passengers, and deliver them safely to their destinations.

🌄 Your Taxi, Your Rules!

In this open-ended driving adventure, you’ll pick up all sorts of passengers, from rushed businessmen and lost tourists to injured hikers and families in distress. But be warned—these roads are no joke! Twisting paths, unexpected obstacles, and the ever-ticking clock will push your driving skills to the limit.

🏔️ Key Features:

🚕 30 Unique Missions – Pick up and drop off passengers, each with their own urgent (or hilarious) reason for needing a ride.
🛣️ Challenging Mountain Roads – Navigate winding roads, narrow cliffs, and steep slopes—without falling off!
⏳ Time-Based Challenges – Some passengers are in a hurry—can you beat the clock?
🎭 Diverse Characters – From a man who forgot his luggage to a guy desperately late for his date, no ride is ever the same!
🚗 Smooth Taxi Controls – Drive with precision using realistic physics and handling.
🎖 Achievements to Unlock – Earn rewards for fast driving, perfect drop-offs, and completing all types of missions!

🏁 What Kind of Rides Will You Take?

✔ Emergency Pickups – Take injured passengers to hospitals or help stranded drivers.
✔ Time-Sensitive Rides – Can you get the passenger to their bus stop before it leaves?
✔ Lost & Found Missions – Help tourists and city newcomers find their way.
✔ Unusual Requests – Deliver groceries, return forgotten phones, and even drive a grandpa who just wants to enjoy the view!

Can you handle the ultimate mountain taxi challenge? Get behind the wheel and prove your driving skills today!

name: Mountain Taxi Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD 4000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Take on the ultimate driving challenge in Mountain Taxi Challenge! Navigate treacherous mountain roads, pick up diverse passengers, and complete 30 unique missions—from emergency rescues to time-sensitive drop-offs. Can you master the winding paths and become the best taxi driver in the mountains?
